day #55 <<<<<<< HEAD /2010/02/24/2010-02-day-55-html/ Wed, 24 Feb 2010 14:54:00 +0000
/2010/02/24/2010-02-day-55-html/ ======= http://dev.jessicasmarquis.com/2010/02/24/2010-02-day-55-html/ Wed, 24 Feb 2010 14:54:00 +0000
http://dev.jessicasmarquis.com/2010/02/24/2010-02-day-55-html/ >>>>>>> minimal ~be cheerful no matter what; pray all the time; thank God no matter what happens.~ 1 thessalonians 5:16-18 it’s been a busy/tough past 2 weeks, at least 4 days of which were spent sprawled on the couch in pain from a toothache. but there was still joy in the pain, and passion to be celebrated. the thing i’m learning this month about passion is that it comes from unexpected places & at unexpected times.
first morning <<<<<<< HEAD /2010/01/01/2010-01-first-morning-html/ Fri, 01 Jan 2010 19:11:00 +0000
/2010/01/01/2010-01-first-morning-html/ ======= http://dev.jessicasmarquis.com/2010/01/01/2010-01-first-morning-html/ Fri, 01 Jan 2010 19:11:00 +0000
http://dev.jessicasmarquis.com/2010/01/01/2010-01-first-morning-html/ >>>>>>> minimal i awoke today refreshed & excited to get started on the next 52 weeks. first question to myself: “how can i be more passionate today?” and i found this is harder to answer than i thought. great idea, frustratingly nebulous execution. so i’m trying something i don’t usually do, just to stir things up. i’m listing 5 things i’m grateful for this morning. sunshine, bright & warm with a promise of high 60-degree temps today.
